Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to services for post-traumatic stress disorder for emergency dispatchers and correction officers
Summary: Requires the same benefits and services for post-traumatic stress disorder for emergency dispatchers and correction officers as are afforded police and firefighters.
LawCode: Add ยง155, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to access to certain mental health care services for emergency dispatchers and correction officers
